attributes.action: Reduce the standard working day hours to six hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Europe's leader in working the longest hours, our productivty is below average when you look at the "hours to productivity" ratio! 
its time to follow some of the other european countries and work shorter days and feel fresher and more awake to fulfil your work load!
